the big ones is that a lot of the virtual desktop deployments that folks do on premises are shared or
oversubscribed instances so their shared session heavily oversubscribed and very
oversubscribed on disk and network and CPU so we have every workspace its own full virtual machine so just like ec2
all of these are getting dedicated CPU RAM disk and network so that you get
really consistent performance other vendors in the desktop is a service market are doing different directions
